text: @realDonaldTrump Coronavirus was know back in December, China was secretive about it. When announced the president should of started the process here in the US when the news broke. He did not, so ignorant of him to think that it wouldn't reach America. He reacted when he was forced to, stupid!!!!

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
